plot: Marcello, a shy tenor, is afraid of singing in public. Two friends of his think of having an elegant youth on the stage pretending to be singing while Marcello dubs him behind the scenes. ...
title: Tre uomini in frak
plot_es: Marcello, a shy tenor, is afraid of singing in public. Two friends of his think of having an elegant youth on the stage pretending to be singing while Marcello dubs him behind the scenes. ...

cast.role: Signora Laura, la padrona del tabarin
cast.name: Maria Wronska
